ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_simp2 | |- ( ( D e. ( NN \ []NN ) /\ A e. ( Pell14QR ` D ) /\ 1 < A ) -> A e. ( Pell14QR ` D ) ) |
